To be fair, Poppy will always be popular due to her utility and anti-engage, not for being inherently OP.

They're also all ranged. Jg used to be the last "safe" role for melee champs since most of them are easily zoned in lanes while ranged champs couldn't clear camps. Most melee champs are nothing more than a liability at this point.
As much as people hate Lee Sin, whenever he wasn't viable it was always a clear sign that something was horribly wrong.

Only because something *MORE* broken had taken his place.

Kindred/Nidalee/Graves may be the current toxic jungle trio, but I'm never letting Lee sin off that easy.

Kindred is just needs more tuning, but she'll reach a good state eventually. 

Riot WILL NOT let go of Nidalee. She is not healthy. She needs to be gutted and rebuilt. What she is now is not working for game health.

Graves needs higher CDs and lower base damage. :^)

> [{quoted}](name=Jasiwel,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LN0xboAm,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2016-05-07T15:50:25.255+0000)
>
> Kindred is just needs more tuning, but she'll reach a good state eventually. 

Keep in mind that MSI is being played on the last patch where Devourer still exists.  I wouldn't be surprised if Kindred was fixed on live.

> Riot WILL NOT let go of Nidalee. She is not healthy. She needs to be gutted and rebuilt. What she is now is not working for game health.

I don't think it's Nidalee herself that is the problem, but the decision to add substantial move speed to just one jungle item.  Move speed is very important in the jungle and while some mages may have needed the help, Nidalee isn't one of them.

Some people just really, really hate the idea of high-impact skillshots though (look at Blitz's perennial ban rates in some elos, even when his win rate is terrible).

> Graves needs higher CDs and lower base damage. :^)

Not sure what to do with Graves -- I've never really understood how he can function in the jungle in the first place with no sustain and just a defensive steroid.  But forcing him to build more damage to do more damage, like they're doing to Ekko, might be a good place to start.

> [{quoted}](name=Partholonian,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LN0xboAm,comment-id=0007000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-07T17:33:14.428+0000)
>
>I've never really understood how he can function in the jungle in the first place with no sustain and just a defensive steroid.

It's the mechanics of his autos. They knock back and stun monsters. Not only does this make his clear super safe, it allows him to instantly knock out scuttler resistances for free.

>it allows him to instantly knock out scuttler resistances for free.

They removed the scuttle resistance lower from his knockback patches ago FYI

Ah, makes sense regarding Kindred. 

Nidalee has just been a pin-pong ball of balance changes because she has been notoriously unhealthy. Blitzcrank at least has high CDs - Nidalee's spears are relatively low CD and if the skillshots themselves don't kill you then the followup execute from her Cougar form will. 

IMO, they need to work on the relationship between Human form and Cougar form more than anything else. Cougar form should be used for re-positioning, not as an execution mechanic.

Graves needs to be put into a weak state before knowing what a healthy state is for him.

Remove Kindred's stupid W passive.

Give Nidalee a meaningful nerf in her jungling (a really meaningful nerf, not just "lower damage by 10 at rank 1, increase damage by 5 at rank 4").


Lower (or remove) the knockback from Graves' autos on Large monsters (since these are heavier than the small guys).

Kindred's W passive is what keeps her alive levels 1-3 and is a requirement for her jungling.  The issue with it is that it's a life STEAL not a life gain, like it should be.  You get extra damage off when you proc it, to the best of my knowledge.  Either way, this isn't what needs nerfed and they did give a meaningful nerf to her early game (Q cooldown soft-reset (old cass E style) when W is active)

Nidalee got a meaningful nerf a few patches ago, they removed most of her ability to kite and fucked up lower-elo nidalee mains and higher-elo nidalee mains alike.  I'm not good enough at kiting yet so I have to grab my E second because I just take too much damage.  It used to be W-Q every time, no matter what.  Even some higher-elo nidalees have to do this from time to time...  Her clear got drastically less safe because of this.  Invade her at level 2 when she's low hp and has no smite (so usually her bot side buff) and you can get a free kill, steal her buff, and set her back far.

Graves... just fuck graves...  no AD Caster in League has been this fucking bursty...  not Varus, not Urgot, not Ezreal.  None of em...  ADCs, carry or caster, should be sustained dps not burst and riot has stated this themselves...
